rules.title: Gameplay
body: *    All feeds and comments are public and they are stored people's own storage. Fupio keeps just the relation data between the posts.
*    People can create posts, comments and follow tags. Tags are matter.
*    User can tag his own post, even with non-following tags. But when user do that, he will become a follower of the tag(s).
*    People can upvote or downvote someone's feed. The algorithm sorts the feeds in the following tag or user wall.
*    All we care about is a good community. There is no followers. But will be add reputation score.
